class.name: AudioStreamMP3
class.description: MP3 audio stream driver. See [member data] if you want to load an MP3 file at run-time. [b]Note:[/b] This class can optionally support legacy MP1 and MP2 formats, provided that the engine is compiled with the [code]minimp3_extra_formats=yes[/code] SCons option. These extra formats are not enabled by default.

method.name: load_from_buffer
method.description: Creates a new [AudioStreamMP3] instance from the given buffer. The buffer must contain MP3 data.

method.name: load_from_file
method.description: Creates a new [AudioStreamMP3] instance from the given file path. The file must be in MP3 format.

members.member: If [code]true[/code], the stream will automatically loop when it reaches the end.
Time in seconds at which the stream starts after being looped.
